# GroupSummaries

**Protocol**

A collection of group summaries.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol GroupSummaries : CustomStringConvertible
```

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A text representation of the group summaries.

## Instance Methods

- **description(options:)**: Generates a text representation of the group summaries.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Retrieves one or more summaries by their group keys.

## Summarizing a Row Grouping

- **summary()**: Generates a group summaries instance for the columns of the row grouping.
- **summary(of:)**: Generates a group summaries instance for the columns you select by name.

## Inherits From

- CustomStringConvertible

items.description: A text representation of the group summaries.
items.name: description

items.description: Generates a text representation of the group summaries.
